dct_title_s: Terra di Canaan ov Terra Promessa ad Abramo, e a suoi posteri
dct_description_sm: presso Antonio Zatta, con privlegio dell'Eccmo Senato.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Decorative title cartouche with illustrations of an altar.
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Appears in Zatta's Atlante novissimo ; Venezia: A Zatta, 1779-1785, [1799], v. 4, map no. 54. Map is listed in the atlas by the cartouche title.
